posts.postText:
His In-Game name: Yager44
His Steam ID: steam_0:0:15122599
Reason: Accidental kill before leaving, thought to be before round shooting but the round had started and the vitim was killed
What server were you playing?: TTT #1 
Who banned you?: Dum possibly?
Why should we unban you?: Accidental and would love to play the server again...several admins have already tried to unban me buy no luck due toname not showing up on the ban list

He was banned last night by dum because he rdm'd then left, he rdm'd someone multiple times within 2 maps. Its a day ban and i feel its deserved still.
Sorry yager :)
Next time he should make his own ban request.

The person in question that he RDM was me. It wasnt  just Random it was Revenge Rdm which is strictly prohibited. he was gone  right after he did it so he was banned through steam id. he was also constantly framing me as a detective in cases where i was proven innocent aswell.
